definitions.definition: To buy the full version of trial software by providing one's details and payment.
definitions.example: This is a trial version, and will expire in 30 days. Please register!

definitions.definition: (mail) To record officially and handle specially.
To make or adjust so as to be properly or precisely aligned.
To place one's name, or have one's name placed in a register.
To be in proper alignment; to align or correspond exactly.
To voluntarily sign over for safe keeping, abandoning complete ownership for partial.
Having had one's name added to an official list or entered into a register
(mail service) Having a mailed item recorded in a register to enable its location to be tracked, sometimes with added insurance to cover loss.
